mapper.select: select * from tb_camp_member where member_id = #{memberId} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_camp_member ( member_id, password, email, phone_number, birth_year, birth_month, birth_date, home_addr ) values ( #{memberId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{birthYear}, #{birthMonth}, #{birthDate}, #{homeAddr} )
insert into tb_member_profile_img ( member_id, ori_name, system_name, file_size, file_path ) values ( #{memberId}, #{oriName}, #{systemName}, #{fileSize}, #{filePath} )
